author: cms-tau-pog
body: Updated tau ID discriminators for 13 TeV & MiniAODv2: updated anti-electron ID from MVA5 to MVA6, added new ID discriminators for 13TeV, removed obsolete discriminators, and updated the db used from CMS_COND_PAT_000 to CMS_CONDITIONS - redo of PR #12298 for 80x
title: 80x new discriminators
